akn:content.akn:p: For the purpose of levying taxes on real property in the District of Columbia, the Council may establish different classes of real property.
For the property tax year beginning July 1, 1979, and ending June 30, 1980, the following classes of real property are established:
For the property tax year beginning July 1, 1980, and ending June 30, 1981, and for each tax year thereafter, the following classes of real property are established:

For the property tax year beginning July 1, 1985, and ending June 30, 1986, and for each subsequent tax year, the following classes of real property not covered in subsection (c-2) or (c-3) of this section are established:

For the property tax year beginning July 1, 1990, and ending June 30, 1991, and the subsequent tax years beginning July 1, 1991, and ending June 30, 1992, and beginning July 1, 1992, and ending June 30, 1993, and for the period beginning July 1, 1993, and ending September 30, 1993, and beginning October 1, 1993, and ending September 30, 1994, the following classes of real property are established:
For the property tax year beginning October 1, 1994, and ending September 30, 1995, and for each subsequent tax year, the following classes of real property are established:
For the real property tax year beginning October 1, 2001, and ending September 30, 2002, the following classes of real property are established:
For the purposes of this section:
If real property tax is owing as a result of a change in classification to Class 3 Property or Class 4 Property, the following shall apply:
